docs.snippet: The spotlight of trading interest in the foreign exchange market last week centered on the sharp decline in the Portuguese escudo, permitting the pound sterling and the free currencies of Canada and Switzerland to slip under the gleam which has...
docs.lead_paragraph: The spotlight of trading interest in the foreign exchange market last week centered on the sharp decline in the Portuguese escudo, permitting the pound sterling and the free currencies of Canada and Switzerland to slip under the gleam which has focused on those documents for a month or more.

docs.snippet: LONDON, Nov. 12 -- The new account was opened quietly in the stock markets here today, buyers preferring to hold off until the supplementary budget delivered in the House of Commons by Hugh Dalton, Chancellor of the Exchecquer, could be digested.

docs.snippet: Disregarding a Soviet threat "grave consequences," the General Assembly voted at Flushing Meadow yesterday to establish United Nations Commission to supervise elections in Korea and he establish a provisional government. The vote was 43 to 0, with...
docs.lead_paragraph: Disregarding a Soviet threat "grave consequences," the General Assembly voted at Flushing Meadow yesterday to establish United Nations Commission to supervise elections in Korea and he establish a provisional government. The vote was 43 to 0, with six announced abstentions.

docs.snippet: FOR the vacationist who thinks it takes a sea voyage to make a holiday, the recent announcement of six-day cruises to Bermuda aboard the Holland-America's Veendam is good news. The Veendam, which will make three cruises to Bermuda -- on Feb. 3, March...
docs.lead_paragraph: FOR the vacationist who thinks it takes a sea voyage to make a holiday, the recent announcement of six-day cruises to Bermuda aboard the Holland-America's Veendam is good news. The Veendam, which will make three cruises to Bermuda -- on Feb. 3, March 16 and April 27 -- will serve as a hotel for passengers while the ship is in port.

docs.snippet: The united Nations General Assembly voted at Flushing Meadow yesterday to hold its session next year in Europe, but an unexpected parliamentary development will require that this decision be confirmed by a different and more decisive balloting...
docs.lead_paragraph: The united Nations General Assembly voted at Flushing Meadow yesterday to hold its session next year in Europe, but an unexpected parliamentary development will require that this decision be confirmed by a different and more decisive balloting procedure.

docs.snippet: In a week the early part of which showed no particular trend in the foreign exchanges, there developed suddenly and unexpectedly on Friday a heavy demand for spot sterling which lifted that, currency for a good size gain but brought in its wake a...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a week the early part of which showed no particular trend in the foreign exchanges, there developed suddenly and unexpectedly on Friday a heavy demand for spot sterling which lifted that, currency for a good size gain but brought in its wake a depressed market in "forwards" and a consequently soft undertone in discounts.
